GeneDef.label: super murderous
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are even more prone to murderous tendencies than normal, causing them to feel the murderous itch super fast compared to normal. Any time is a killer time if you're stabby enough.

GeneDef.label: extremely murderous
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are even more prone to murderous tendencies than normal, causing them to feel the murderous itch extremely fast compared to normal.

GeneDef.label: major murderous
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are even more prone to murderous tendencies than normal, causing them to feel the murderous itch much faster than normal.

GeneDef.label: murderous
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are even more prone to murderous tendencies than normal, causing them to feel the murderous itch faster than normal.

GeneDef.label: minor murderous
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are even more prone to murderous tendencies than normal, causing them to feel the murderous itch a little faster than normal.

GeneDef.label: somewhat placated
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene do not feel experience as much of a murderous urge as most with the kill thirst gene, causing it to become unbearable a little slower.

GeneDef.label: placated
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene do not feel experience as much of a murderous urge as most with the kill thirst gene, causing it to become unbearable slower.

GeneDef.label: very placated
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene do not feel experience as much of a murderous urge as most with the kill thirst gene, causing it to become unbearable a lot slower.
